name: get_company_quote_price_data
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool stoxx.
Tool description: Retrieve live and historical information for publicly traded companies
API description: Retrieve updated quote and pricing data for a given company. This endpoint provides you with:

- Symbol
- Company Name
- Exchange
- High
- Low
- Close
- PE
- Volume
- Market Cap
- Datetime

ticker.description: The ticker symbol of the company to retrieve data for.
